description:
In order to manage the snapshot of vm in glance conveniently, we need know which images in glance are captured from VM.
So we need add new property in glance metadata when create the vm snapshot, for example: server_id = vm uuid. This new property will help to filter the image when use the glance image-list.
title: Need a property in glance metadata to indicate the vm id when create vm snapshot
